textAfterTable: « first ‹ previous …111213141516171819… next › last » RSS Syndication AE Site RSS Feed PvM's Blog RSS AE Public BB RSS Feed Antievolutionists Say the Darndest Things Antievolutionists often express outrage over alleged incivility from those who oppose their efforts to evade the establishment clause of the First Amendment. But they have no difficulty in dishing out the abuse themselves. Here is a sample from the Invidious Comparisons thread that documents egregious behavior on the part of the religious antievolution advocates. IDC advocate Stephen C.
